evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief, Three Judge Panel Requested
evidence.text: 19. Plaintiff THE SOUTH CAROLINA STATE CONFERENCE OF THE NAACP (“South Carolina NAACP”) is a nonprofit, nonpartisan membership organization in South Carolina. The South Carolina NAACP is a state conference of branches of the National Association for the Advancement of Colored People (“NAACP”), a national civil rights organization.
